name: Africa
description: The world's second largest and second most-populous continent (the first being Asia in both categories)

name: Antarctica
description: Earth's southernmost continent. It contains the geographic South Pole and is situated in the Antarctic region of the Southern Hemisphere

name: Asia
description: Earth's largest and most populous continent, located primarily in the Eastern and Northern Hemispheres

name: Europe
description: A continent located entirely in the Northern Hemisphere and mostly in the Eastern Hemisphere

name: North America
description: A continent entirely within the Northern Hemisphere and almost all within the Western Hemisphere

name: Oceania
description: A continent comprising mainland Australia, Tasmania, New Guinea, Seram, possibly Timor, and neighbouring islands

name: South America
description: A continent located in the western hemisphere, mostly in the southern hemisphere, with a relatively small portion in the northern hemisphere
